string-array.name: lesson_000_text
string-array.item:
From a seed sprouting to
 automobile manufacturing,
 chemistry plays a
 pivotal role everyday.

Chemistry is the study of
 matter, specifically the
 properties and transformation
 of matter.
The field of chemistry\n holds a wide range of topics.

Known to be considered as a
 'central science', chemistry can
 easily branch out to other
 scientific fields, such as
 biochemistry and astronomy.
Here in Chemilite, there\n are many basic topics of\n chemistry to be uncovered!
Note: Please refer to\n \'About Chemilite\' via\n \'Index\' tab.

string-array.name: lesson_001_text
string-array.item:
Every law and theory in
 science must undergo through
 a series of observations,
 hypotheses, and experiments
 in order to properly confirm
 a solution to a problem.
This procedure is known as\n the \'scientific method\'.
The scientific method has\n used for a long time by\n previous scientists.
Thus, many laws and theories\n were discovered.

I. Observation
 The first part of the
 scientific method is forming
 observations.

Depending on the results
 a scientific method has been
 performed!
 Even when the hypothesis is
 proven wrong by the experiment,
 a new hypothesis is born.
 As a result, another experiment
 would have to be performed.
Aside from this, let\'s talk\n about theories and laws.
